title: What is this font?
content:
Can anybody name this font? I think it may be one of from DTL, but I cannot find it. Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090625061943im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WhatsThis_6702)
author: Cyberdave

comments.content:
I think it’s Versa Sans by Peter Verheul.  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/ourtype/versa\_sans\_family/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090625061943/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/ourtype/versa_sans_family/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/ourtype/versa\_sans\_family/")
Pieter was faster! typical edgy y
Cool. That’s the one. Thanks guys.
